title: AI Model Resilience
description: Timeout handling, fallbacks, and graceful degradation patterns for robust AI model interactions.
rationale: Addresses concurrent AI invocation rate limits and model unavailability risks

title: End-to-End Testing Framework for Governance
description: Create a test suite that simulates the entire governance process from proposal to implementation.
rationale: Comprehensive testing coverage for the complete governance lifecycle

title: Python Script Testing Framework
description: Develop comprehensive test suites for all Python automation components.
rationale: Ensures reliability and correctness of Python-based automation scripts

title: Voting Chain Integrity Verification
description: Implement a tool to verify the entire voting chain's integrity, not just individual blocks.
rationale: Ensures complete chain integrity beyond individual block verification

title: Anti-Sybil Mechanisms
description: Implement identity verification and rate-limiting for voting participants.
rationale: Prevents vote spamming and ensures fair participation in governance

title: Secure Script Execution Environment
description: Implement sandboxed execution for Python scripts with resource limits.
rationale: Protects against security vulnerabilities in script execution

title: Scalable Voting Chain Architecture
description: Explore alternative data structures (DAGs, merkle trees) for high-throughput governance.
rationale: Improves voting chain scalability beyond linear structures

title: Performance Optimization Pipeline
description: Create profiling and optimization tools for high-volume governance operations.
rationale: Systematic performance optimization for high-volume scenarios

title: Data Schema Validation Pipeline
description: Integrate JSON Schema validation into CI for all core data files.
rationale: Prevents data corruption through automated schema validation

title: Governance State Management Service
description: Define a formal state service in the extension to manage the lifecycle of BIPs, votes, and reviews.
rationale: Provides robust state management for concurrent governance operations

title: Decoupled Data Layer
description: Evolve from scattered JSON files to a more robust data store (e.g., SQLite) for transactional integrity.
rationale: Improves data consistency and transactional reliability

title: Protocol Versioning Framework
description: Add support for version negotiation and backward compatibility.
rationale: Enables smooth protocol evolution and backward compatibility

title: Enhanced Logging Framework
description: Implement a comprehensive logging strategy across all scripts for better traceability.
rationale: Improves troubleshooting and audit capabilities across all scripts

title: Unified Governance Notification System
description: Implement a centralized system for real-time alerts on all governance activities.
rationale: Streamlines communication about governance events and status updates

title: Automated Rollback Mechanisms
description: Develop automated rollback procedures for BIP implementations and voting errors.
rationale: Provides safety mechanisms for failed implementations and error recovery

title: Error Handling and Recovery Protocol
description: Implement robust error detection and automated recovery mechanisms.
rationale: Improves system resilience and error recovery capabilities

title: Automated Validation Script Extension
description: Develop a framework to easily extend validation for new BIP types and requirements.
rationale: Enables flexible validation framework for evolving BIP requirements

title: Cross-IDE Portability Assessment & Strategy
description: Evaluate and plan for broader IDE compatibility beyond Cursor.
rationale: Prepares for multi-IDE support and reduces platform dependency risks

title: Model Registry Unification
description: Single YAML registry + tooling for sync across all governance components.
rationale: Ensures consistency of model lists and weights across all system components
